sec.p: We captured hares at each study site throughout the year in live traps (Tomahawk Live Trap Company, Tomahawk, WI, USA), then ear-tagged, weighed and sexed each individual; hares weighing over 900 g (=199 individuals) were fitted with VHF radiocollars (weight less than or equal to 40 g, Wildlife Materials, Murphysboro, IL, USA; [ 25, 26]).
